verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. In <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> do I take <S%H2620>refuge<s%>: How <S%H559>say<s%> ye to my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, <S%H5110>Flee<s%> as a <S%H6833>bird<s%> to your <S%H2022>mountain<s%>;

For <S%H7563><s%>, lo, the wicked <S%H1869>bend<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%>, They make <S%H3559>ready<s%> their <S%H2671>arrow<s%> upon the <S%H3499>string<s%>, That they may <S%H3384>shoot<s%> in <S%H652>darkness<s%> at the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%>;
If the <S%H8356>foundations<s%> be <S%H2040>destroyed<s%>, What can the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6466>do<s%>?

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>; <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, his <S%H3678>throne<s%> is in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H2372>behold<s%>, his <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> <S%H974>try<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H974>trieth<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> and him that <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8130>hateth<s%>.

Upon the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> he will <S%H4305>rain<s%> <S%H6341>snares<s%>; <S%H784>Fire<s%> and <S%H1614>brimstone<s%> and <S%H2152>burning<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> shall be the <S%H4521>portion<s%> of their <S%H3563>cup<s%>.
For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; He <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>: The <S%H6662>upright<s%> shall <S%H2372>behold<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%>.
